pages.text: The $(thing)Breezevine Flower$() is a unique magical plant that harnesses the power of wind to create directional gusts. Its vine-like structure allows it to channel air in specific patterns, creating sustained currents.

$(bold)Cultivation Notes:$()$(br)- Must be planted on Grove Soil infused with Gust Essence$(br)- Grows best at high elevations where air currents are stronger$(br)- Requires open space to develop fully$(br)- When mature, creates a constant directional breeze that can propel entities

pages.title: Essence Crafting
pages.text: The magic of Breezevine combines the properties of air (Gust) and stability (Rootgrasp). This crafting method produces essence using a Rootgrasp bloom and Gust essences, capturing the plant's wind-channeling properties.

pages.title: Bloom Properties
pages.text: Breezevine blooms harness constant, directional wind energy. Unlike the more chaotic Gust Flower, Breezevine creates sustained air currents that can be precisely controlled and maintained for extended periods.

pages.title: Advanced Applications
pages.text: $(li)Creation of wind tunnels and air flow control systems$(li)Enhanced air-based transportation methods$(li)Long-term wind barriers and shields$(li)Propulsion systems for magical devices$(li)Weather manipulation when used in sufficient quantities$(br2)$(italic)Note: Breezevine essence is particularly useful for sustained aerial effects where control is more important than raw power.$()
